Package com.company.ems.builder

Interface EmployeeBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
FullTimeEmployeeBuilder, PartTimeEmployeeBuilder
public interface EmployeeBuilder
Interface for building different parts of an Employee object.

The EmployeeBuilder interface provides methods for setting various attributes of an employee, such as their ID, name, department, role, working hours, and salary. This pattern allows for step-by-step construction of an employee object, enabling flexibility when creating different types of employees (e.g., full-time, part-time, etc.).

Implementing classes should provide specific behavior for constructing employees, and the build() method should return a fully constructed Employee object after all required attributes have been set.

This interface is part of the Builder design pattern and is typically used in conjunction with a director class that orchestrates the building process.

See Also:
